channel.title: How U Livin J. Piven Podcast
channel.description: Join Jeremy Piven as he dives deep into all things life and comedy with the biggest names in Hollywood and business; from his film and TV co-stars to the hottest acts in hip hop, comedy, and tech, nothing is off the table. Let’s go ahead and flip some tables!
channel.itunes:summary: Join Jeremy Piven as he dives deep into all things life and comedy with the biggest names in Hollywood and business; from his film and TV co-stars to the hottest acts in hip hop, comedy, and tech, nothing is off the table. Let’s go ahead and flip some tables!

image.title: How U Livin J. Piven Podcast

item.title: Super Bowl Shuffle with '85 Bears QB Jim McMahon!
item.itunes:title: Super Bowl Shuffle with '85 Bears QB Jim McMahon!
item.description:
In the 1980's, QB Jim McMahon was the bad boy of the NFL and his team, the Super Bowl winning 1985 Chicago Bears, is widely considered to be one of the best teams of all time. It's been nearly 40 years since the "Super Bowl Shuffle" was unleashed on the American public but Jim is still a badass and he doesn't give two-shits about what you think. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: "Bad Vegan" Sarma Melngailis Tells All!
item.itunes:title: "Bad Vegan" Sarma Melngailis Tells All!
item.description:
BAD VEGAN... Everyone is talking about it. It's one of the hottest shows on Netflix and there are so many unanswered questions. Well Sarma herself (and Leon!) is here for an epic two-hour tell-all. Everything you ever wanted to know plus a few genuine surprises. Grab some tofu and quinoa, we're diving in! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

item.title: Jessimae Peluso: Take Me To Pound Town! (Part 1)
item.itunes:title: Jessimae Peluso: Take Me To Pound Town! (Part 1)
item.description:
Jessimae Peluso is the host of at least 147 podcasts and a killer standup comic. She's a terrible influence and made Jeremy smoke some serious loud during the show so the conversation is absolutely insane but probably the funniest thing you'll hear all week. We're talking mansplaining, hairy ankles, and most importantly Jeremy's butt related g-spot. It's so good we had to break it up into two episodes... Enjoy! 

We want to hear from you! Leave us voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven and you could have your question answered on a future episode.

IG: @HowULivinJPivenPodcast
Twitter: @howulivinjpiv
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HowULivinJPiven/

item.title: Tom Dreesen: Sinatra’s Favorite Comedian
item.itunes:title: Tom Dreesen: Sinatra’s Favorite Comedian
item.description:
With more than 60 appearances on The Tonight Show, to touring with Sinatra for over a decade, Tom Dreesen is as legendary as it gets in comedy. In the last episode of 2021, Tom teaches Jeremy a lifetime’s worth of showbiz knowledge.

Remember, send us an email at jpiven@kastmedia.com or leave us voicemail at  https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven to be featured during “Rolling Calls with Ari Gold” where Jeremy answers questions from the listeners as Ari Gold.

item.title: Ricky Williams: From Heisman to Highsman - Part 2
item.itunes:title: Ricky Williams: From Heisman to Highsman - Part 2
item.description:
Former NFL superstar and Heisman Trophy winner Ricky Williams has one of the greatest stories I’ve ever heard. After being suspended for the entire 2006 NFL season for testing positive for marijuana, he retired from football, started a Yoga and healing practice, and has since built a thriving medical marijuana company called Highsman. Ricky is a one of a kind, brilliant, wonderful human being that I was honored to speak with, and we wrap up the conversation in today's episode.


Remember, send us an email at jpiven@kastmedia.com or leave us voicemail at  https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven to be featured during “Rolling Calls with Ari Gold” where Jeremy answers questions from the listeners as Ari Gold. 

IG: https://www.howulivinjpivenpodcastshow
Twitter: https://www.howulivinjpivshow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HowULivinJPiven/
Ricky's IG: https://www.instagram.com/williams

item.content:encoded:
Former NFL superstar and Heisman Trophy winner Ricky Williams has one of the greatest stories I’ve ever heard. After being suspended for the entire 2006 NFL season for testing positive for marijuana, he retired from football, started a Yoga and healing practice, and has since built a thriving medical marijuana company called Highsman. Ricky is a one of a kind, brilliant, wonderful human being and we are honored to speak with him for 2 fascinating episodes.

item.title: The Unfiltered Comeback of Oscar De La Hoya
item.itunes:title: The Unfiltered Comeback of Oscar De La Hoya
item.description:
After his devastating loss to Manny Pacquiao over a decade ago, Oscar De La Hoya went into a dark depression. Addicted to booze, drugs, and woman, his absence from the ring created a darkness that nearly defeated the all-time great. But Oscar refuses to let his fall from grace define him and he’s planning an epic comeback to the spotlight. In this supremely unfiltered interview, Oscar leaves it all on the canvas and leaves Jeremy nearly speechless. This one is special. 

If you have any questions or comments for JP, send us an email at jpiven@kastmedia.com or leave us voicemail https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven

item.title: Tiffany Haddish is Married to Comedy (Pt 2 of 2)
item.itunes:title: Tiffany Haddish is Married to Comedy (Pt 2 of 2)
item.description:
In this second half, Grammy winning comedy sensation Tiffany Haddish came from the bottom. Now she’s here to slay. Not only is she the funniest woman in the world, she’s incredibly honest and heartfelt and embraces the tragedies in her life as much as the success. Her story is real, the laughter is real, and the tears are real. This one is special and i’m so thankful to Tiffany for sharing her truth.

Join Jeremy Piven as he dives deep into all things life and comedy with the biggest names in Hollywood and business; from his film and TV co-stars to the hottest acts in hip hop, comedy, and tech, nothing is off the table. Let’s go ahead and flip some tables!
